Reviews.Title: “Metropol Has All You Need”
Reviews.Author: Steven S
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel metropol couple friends loved location close zocalo fine arts museum etc air antique market fair walk otherwise centrally located short visit staff friendly helpful easier wherever value untoward surprises highly recommended complaints

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: backpacker2110
Reviews.Content: hotel location near zocalo main plaza metro stations restaurants famous sights mexico city staff friendly safe refundable deposit hot water restaurant hotel clean spacious type hotel stay sometimes noisy traffic streets thats mexico city

Reviews.Title: “Good service, good value, good location”
Reviews.Author: Ewa_Z
Reviews.Content: positives location close bellas artes 10 minutes zocalo typical western european standard average business hotel thrills shame clean spacey etc deal booked internet especially considering capital city downsides

Reviews.Title: “great location, great price”
Reviews.Author: mss059
Reviews.Content: blocks easy walk historic centre clean little noisy thats mexico city staff friendly available night late arrivals staffs lack english lack spanish causes confusion dealt save plumbing hope dealt vacated nice little lounge expensive restaurant lots options tourist service helpful english speaking gentleman office eager help chased block clarify morning dont bother guys flogging tours street

Reviews.Title: “Good service and location”
Reviews.Author: Dean W
Reviews.Content: bad start trip mexico city transfer pick arrived hotel booking fault travel agent reservation staff hotel tried figure agent hadnt sent accommodation voucher eventually sorted staff metropol youd hotel couple staff hotel speaks fluent english cause hotel basic slightly dated clean comfortable tv english channels safe 10 usd deposit required dressing bath shower hotels restaurant nice prices low corner hotel restaurants 711 hotel 10 minutes walk la located lobby hotel travel office trips local attractions purchased paid 70 usd people ruins stops recommend hotel due help received location

Reviews.Title: “Clean and nice people”
Reviews.Author: LyricJen
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights tour departing staff hotel nice cleaning lady courteous location central close zocalo cathedral pharmacy restaurants subways didnt feel dangerous mexico city walked late night paid 55 bargain definitely recommend deal

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Metropol
HotelInfo.Address: Luis Moya 39 | Zona Centro, Mexico City 06050, Mexico
